description.en: Cat-sucking teenager Meng Changji travels through a car accident and is bound to a harmonic system in critical moments. What is Harmony Practice? It's the practice that doesn't take the usual path! When you are kidnapped, others are looking for opportunities to escape, but this young master walks away with anger, slaps you up first, and likes to increase your cultivation value! When I met Meiyan Yujie for a competition invitation, others used male hormones and strength to conquer her, and this young master...this young master is still in Novice Village! Of course it’s important to hold your thigh! The first Harmony Emperor in history, does not practice according to the routine, harvesting cultivation value like leeks! A long time later, Meng Changji, who thought he was bronze, discovered that he was already the king!
